welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bang Bua Thong, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and delicious street food. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Don Muang Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Don Muang Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be slow during peak hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport, exclusively serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Suvarnabhumi Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and connectivity.
